item.title: Good Physique & Polio-stricken Chicken's Leg
item.description: I don’t know whether to be happy or doubtful when a stranger walks up to me in the gym and Stranger : Hey Me : Hi Stranger : You are regular here? Me : (have you ever seen me here earlier?) No. Second day in this gym. Stranger : Oh okay. Me : Why?
